system.description: Conjures a field of rubbery black tentacles that grasp and entwine creatures in the area, holding them fast and crushing them. Every creature in the 20-ft. radius must make a grapple check opposed by the tentacles (treated as Large, BAB = caster level, Str 19). Grappled creatures take 1d6+4 bludgeoning damage each round. Movement through the area is at half speed.

components.materialDescription: A piece of tentacle from a giant octopus or a giant squid.
